name: Saviour (SkelleRoznik)
description:
This is a mini game made for Ludum Dare 46. It is about saving a cat fallen to the pit with spikes and ... flying hearts? 

You play as a cat claws sharpener tied to a rope carrying a cat through this scary place. Your goal is to rescue it and not to touch the spikes, he doesn't like it.

You control the origin of the rope with your mouse. It can move right and left.

You can go faster by holding a left mouse button.

Cat has 3 lives. Hitting a spike removes 1 life.

Taking a flying heart heals 1 life. 

Along the way you'll activate check points. If you lose after that and click restart, you'll respawn on the last activated check point.

SkelleRoznik - Art/Design/Programming

freesound.org - Music/Sound effects

flaticon.com - Cat paw icon
